mapper.select: SELECT * FROM sale_payfor WHERE wechatpayId = #{appId} AND wechatpayAgent = #{mch_id}
SELECT top 1 * FROM sale_payfor WHERE alipayId = #{appId}

SELECT a.deviceNum, a.deviceName, a.deviceType, a.pointName, b.productId ,c.productName,c.saleCount,c.saleMoney FROM sale_device a INNER JOIN sale_device_product b ON a.id = b.deviceId AND b.isSale =1 INNER JOIN (SELECT productId,productName, COUNT( productId ) as saleCount, SUM( price ) as saleMoney FROM sale_order WHERE payState = 1 AND orderState = 1
and creationTime >= #{start}
and creationTime <= #{end}
GROUP BY productId,productName) c on b.productId =c.productId
a.deviceName like '%${deviceName}%'
a.pointName like '%${pointName}%'
ORDER BY c.saleCount desc

SELECT a.*,c.deviceName FROM ( SELECT productId, productName, COUNT( a.productId ) saleCount, SUM( a.price ) saleMoney FROM sale_order a WHERE a.payState = 1 AND a.orderState = 1
and a.creationTime >= #{start}
and a.creationTime <= #{end}
and a.productName like '%${productName}%'
GROUP BY a.productId, a.productName ) a INNER JOIN sale_device_product b ON a.productId = b.productId INNER JOIN sale_device c ON b.deviceId = c.id
c.deviceName like '%${deviceName}%'
order by a.saleCount desc
